title: Pia Miller goes hiking with millionaire Hollywood agent beau Patrick Whitesell at Amangiri resort
text:
They've enjoyed romantic holidays in Europe together, travelling everywhere from Paris to yachting off the coast of Italy.

And now Pia Miller and millionaire Hollywood agent boyfriend Patrick Whitesell are enjoying time together at the luxurious Amangiri resort in Utah.

The former Home and Away star took to Instagram this week to share snaps from their time away in the American desert from when they went hiking, with accommodation costing upwards of $3,300 (AU) a night.

'The best day': Former Home and Away star Pia Miller goes hiking with millionaire Hollywood agent boyfriend Patrick Whitesell... as they holiday at the luxurious $3,300 per night Amangiri resort in Utah

'The best day,' Pia, 35, captioned a snap of herself in her workout gear.

She also shared snaps of her and Patrick and some friends crossing a bridge and standing in front of a gorgeous rock formation.

Pia also shared a video of their accommodation, showing a stunning lap pool overlooking the idyllic landscape.

Exploring: She also shared snaps of her and Patrick (R) and some friends crossing a bridge and standing in front of a gorgeous rock formation

What a view! Pictured a is a bridge crossing not too far from the resort

Celeb favourite: The resort is a celebrity favourite, with the likes of Kim Kardashian, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Shanina Shaik and Lara Bingle having stayed there

The brunette beauty also shared a snap of two glasses of red wine that she enjoyed at sunset with fires going in the background.

The resort is a celebrity favourite, with the likes of Kim Kardashian, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Shanina Shaik and Lara Bingle having stayed there.

The resort offers access to the Grand Canyon, Zion National Park, and guests can enjoy activities including balloon rides and horse riding.

Luxe: Pia also shared a video of their accommodation, showing a stunning lap pool overlooking the idyllic landscape

Time to relax! The brunette beauty also shared a snap of two glasses of red wine that she enjoyed at sunset with fires going in the background

It also has a wellness spa and fine dining.

Pia and Patrick were pictured out together for the first time in August while on a yacht in Italy.

However in May, she shared a selfie to Instagram tagged at Mexico's El Dorado Golf & Beach Club, where Patrick, 54, reportedly 'owns a second home'.

It's heating up! Pia and Patrick were pictured out together for the first time in August while on a yacht in Italy (pictured at a Halloween party earlier at the weekend in Hollywood)

Away from Mexico, the couple enjoyed a romantic trip to Paris in June, where Pia wrote via Instagram: 'The city of lights - I'm in love'.

In August, Pia and Patrick united in Los Angeles before boarding a private plane to Europe together, and were later spotted on a yacht in Italy.

The pair were joined by American Idol host Ryan Seacrest, 44, and his on-again-off-again model girlfriend Shayna Taylor, 27.

Going strong: The couple enjoyed a romantic trip to Paris in June, where Pia wrote via Instagram: 'The city of lights - I'm in love'

Page Six recently reported that Pia and Patrick had been quietly dating for months.

'They've been on a couple of dates so far,' said a source in August.

Patrick is the CEO of Hollywood talent agency WME and represents the likes of Ben Affleck, Matt Damon and Hugh Jackman.

He is worth an estimated $440million, according to Forbes.
